questions.question: Considering the overall form, what geometrical shape best describes each individual container?

Observing the design, what is the central feature on each of the blue lids, a concentric marking?

Observing the lids, what type of closure mechanism do they employ; hinged or snap-on?

Describing the visual depth, are the containers shallow or relatively deep?

Considering the size, are these containers generally small, medium, or large in capacity?
Considering the finish, would you characterize the container surfaces as glossy or matte?
Observing the construction, do the containers appear to be disposable or reusable?
